Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The first high-resolution solution-state structure of a member of the toxin-agglutinin folding motif with the WGA disulfide linkage is presented.
Sequence Information.Function: N-acetyl-D-glucosamine / N-acetyl-D-neuraminic acid binding lectin. Can inhibit fungal growth. Causes an allergic reaction in human.
Sequence Information.PTM: Proteolytically processed to yield the two chains of the mature protein, and it Contains four disulfide bonds 3-18; 12-24; 17-31; 37-41.
